item.description:
Boston Ron Paul supporters will celebrate the New Year and Ron Paul's coming 2008 election victory at 5:00 pm in front of the Copley Square library in Boston. We will begin with a sign wave and then march from there. Improvisation is the order of the evening but make sure to have a Ron Paul sign in hand.. !

Call Jeffrey at 203-767-3514 with ideas or suggestions for the evening.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Ron Paul signs in front of the library and Jeffrey Marsh at 203-767-3514
item.name: Ron Paul New Year's Eve Extravaganza
